entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
